page.title: Subscriptions & Credits
page.description: Manage your subscription, purchase credits, and view your history.

currentPlan.switchPeriodInfo: To switch back to monthly payments, please cancel your yearly subscription

cancelModal.title: Cancel your subscription?

reactivateModal.keepPlan: You will keep your {planName} plan after {date}

yearlyWarningModal.title: Switch to yearly billing?

yearlyWarningModal.termsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service

downgradeToFreeModal.title: Switch to Free plan

downgradeToFreeModal.canUpgrade: You can upgrade again at any time

downgradePaidModal.title: Confirm downgrade
downgradePaidModal.description: Your subscription will be changed at the end of your current period.
downgradePaidModal.keepCurrentPlan: You keep your current plan until the end of your period
downgradePaidModal.newInvoice: A new invoice will be issued on the effective date
downgradePaidModal.canCancel: You can cancel this change at any time before the effective date
downgradePaidModal.termsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service

upgradeModal.title: Confirm upgrade
upgradeModal.prorataInfo: Calculated amount for the remaining period (automatic proration)
upgradeModal.immediate: Your new plan will be activated immediately
upgradeModal.invoiceInfo: The invoice will be available in the History tab
upgradeModal.yearlyWarning: Once switched to yearly billing, you cannot go back to monthly payments
upgradeModal.stayYearly: You will remain on yearly billing until {date}
upgradeModal.creditApplied: {months} months offered thanks to your credit
upgradeModal.termsRequired: You must accept the Terms of Service

features.title: Monthly usage
features.resetInfo: Counters reset on your subscription anniversary date
